description.lang: Master Roller Blind IO is ready to operate with Z-Wave controllers and configured to be managed by Simon100 IO APP using the HUB plug IO for getting a better user experience. Sending the Blind controller by other window covering devices Up/Down/Stop.
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline

ctrl.This group is used to add the devices to be controlled by Master Roller blind. Device sends Basic Sets, Multilevel Start or Stop level change when controlling sunblinds, and Manufacturer specific Gets, Configuration Gets and Sets when manual association is being performed over Simon devices.
Activates the Central LED. Configuration Used by Masters iO in order to identify the devices associated to their Group2 during manual association process.
Turns Central LED OFF
Turns Central LED ON
Sets the Left and Right LEDs to 20% in order to find the device and the touch areas at night.
Left and Right LEDs OFF
Left and Right LEDs ON at 20percent

Locks the local control of associated devices and controller. This configuration does not modifies the control via Z-Wave, where if a Set is received it will retransmitted to all group 2 associated nodes
Local action enabled
Local action locked
Write only parameter used to restore configurations or perform a completely restore default.
Factory reset
Configuration values are restored
Enables or disables the manual association process.
Hold press of 10sec to 30sec starts manual association of devices to group 2
Hold press of 10sec to 30sec sends a Node Info
Defines the function performed by the device when keypad is pressed
short press switches between the last power on and off (depending on the status of the associated control) by sending a Basic Set to 0x00 or 0xFF to the associated nodes. The touch area does not work
Short press activates those associated by sending Basic Set to 0xFF
Short press deactivates those associated by sending Basic Set to 0x00
Short Press UP always activates those associated with the last power on by sending a Basic Set 0xFF. Short Press DOWN always deactivates those associated by sending a Basic Set to 0x00.
Short Press always turn on the associated nodes by sending a Basic Set to 0xFF. Press from 2sec to 10sec always turns off the associated nodes by sending a Basic Set to 0x00

Short pressi on UP Area, if controlled device/s already have the value set on Config Param 26, Basic Set 0x00 is sent and UP and DOWN LEDs are turned off; Otherwise Basic Set with value (Param 26) is sent and UP LED light up for 5 sec. After short pressing on DOWN Area, if controlled device/s already have the value set on Config Param 25, Basic Set 0x00 is sent and UP
the key works as described on keypad use and feedbaks
Write only value that performs a fast blink on Central LED during 5 seconds in order to identify the device when it is installed in a multiple frame
Central LED performs a fast blink
Configuration used to know the device state and last dimming or sunblind position.
Load is OFF or sunblind is stopped with diming value or position x
Load is ON or sunblind is going DOWN with diming value or position x
Load is ON or sunblind is going UP with diming value or position x
Value used as DOWN side value when Parameter 20 value is 6Value is SET in hexadecimal format.
Value used as DOWN side value when Parameter 20 value is 6 in order to set the loat to the value
Value used as UP side value when Parameter 20 value is 6 in order to Activate Load
Value used as UP side value when Parameter 20 value is 6Value is SET in hexadecimal format.
Value used as UP side value when Parameter 20 value is 6 in order to Set Load to this value
Value used as UP side value when Parameter 20 value is 6 in order to Activate Load

Locks the major part of Hold press effects in order to avoid undesired Z-Wave changes, associations or restores Default. 0xFF Hold Press from 2sec to 10 sec does not performs a Node info. Hold Press of 10 to 30 does not performs a manual association process. Hold press of 30sec restores configuration except Lock Hold Press, and sends a Node info in order to add or remove from Z-Wave Network.
Hold press is available
Hold Press is Locked

This configuration has only effects when there is only 1 associated node in group 2.Is used to set if Master has to be always informed about the controlled device state or it is consulted when user touchs the keypad.
Device must receive reports about controlled device state.
Device consults the device state once keypad detects touch
Disables the sending of Central Scene Notifications to avoid perform 2 actions at same time (Central Scene action and Group 2 action).
Device does not sends Central Scene Notifications
Device sends Central Scene Notifications is no devices are added to group 2
